concept.title: Notifications and events for player status, activity, errors, and logging
concept.shortdesc: MediaPlayerStatus objects provide information about changes in player status. Notification objects provide information about warnings and errors. Errors that stop the playback of the video also cause a change in the status of the player. You implement event listeners to capture and respond to events (MediaPlayerEvent objects).

conbody.p: Your application can retrieve notification and status information. Using this information, you could also create a logging system for diagnostics and validation.
